hero.name: Shreyash Gupta
hero.heading: Hay! Iâ€™m
hero.description: With a fervent dedication to both frontend development and network engineering, I bring a unique blend of creativity and technical expertise to every project. Despite being a newcomer, my freelance endeavors underscore my commitment to client satisfaction. Let's collaborate to transform your vision into reality and ensure your utmost happiness with the results!

about.title: I AM AVAILABLE FOR WEBSITE and LINUX PROJECTS
about.description: I'm a dynamic individual with a fervent passion for frontend development and network engineering. Despite being a fresher in the field, my portfolio as a freelancer speaks volumes about my dedication to client satisfaction and delivering exceptional results. I thrive on challenges, constantly seeking opportunities to learn and grow. Let's join forces to bring your projects to life and ensure your utmost satisfaction every step of the way!

details.title: Real-time monitoring and identification of violent behavior through AI-powered analysis.
details.description: Detectron revolutionizes CCTV surveillance by integrating AI, machine learning, and IoT technologies,transforming traditional cameras into intelligent, proactive systems that continuously monitor environments,detect unusual activities, and provide real-time alerts, significantly enhancing urban safety, operationalefficiency, and enabling faster response to security threats in smart cities.

details.title: Autonomous path tracking using sensors for precise navigation
details.description: An autonomous Line Follower Robot uses sensors to detect and follow predefined paths accurately. It continuously adjusts its movements to stay on the track, ensuring precise navigation. Designed for efficiency,this robot operates independently, making it ideal for tasks that require reliable and consistent path tracking .

details.title: Website development for Kings of Cloud Restaurant
details.description: Developed a responsive website for a luxury sky dining restaurant, featuring an elegant design, interactive menu, online reservation system, and photo gallery. The site enhances user experience with smooth navigation and mobile compatibility, providing customers with a seamless way to explore offerings and book tables at their convenience.

details.title: Text to Image Generator Imagine
details.description: The Text-to-Image Generator: Imagine Project transforms written text into visually rich AI-generated images using advanced deep learning models. It enables users to create art from prompts, supporting creativity and visual storytelling. The platform offers a user-friendly interface for real-time image generation, merging language understanding with powerful image synthesis.

allProjects.title: Web crawlers
allProjects.subTitle: Automated data extraction streamlines the process of collecting information.

details.title: Automated Data Extraction from the Web
details.description: The Web Crawler Project is designed to automatically browse websites and extract relevant data such as text, links, and metadata. Built using Python and libraries like BeautifulSoup and Scrapy, it enables efficient data collection for research, analytics, and automation, supporting large-scale web indexing and real-time content monitoring tasks.

allProjects.title: Website Design
allProjects.subTitle: Seamless shopping experience with secure transactions.Optimized for users.

details.title: Connecting Buyers and Sellers Effortlessly
details.description: The E-commerce Website Project delivers a user-friendly online platform for buying and selling products efficiently. It features secure payment gateways, dynamic product listings, user accounts, and order tracking.Designed with responsive layouts, it ensures seamless shopping experiences across devices, enhancing customer satisfaction and boosting sales for businesses.

allService.title: Web Developemnet
allService.subTitle: I build responsive, scalable websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, tailored to client-specific needs.

allService.title: App Development
allService.subTitle: I offer app development services with focus on performance, UI/UX, scalability, and cross-platform support.

allService.title: Computer Network
allService.subTitle: I offer network setup, optimization, and maintenance services to ensure efficient and secure connectivity for Organization.

allService.title: Linux Administrator
allService.subTitle: I provide Linux server management, security, automation, updates, backups, and performance optimization.

allExperience.companyDescription: Managed and executed multiple high-impact projects across diverse departments,demonstrating strongleadership and organizational skills.Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams, ensuring clearcommunication, alignment of goals, and efficient task delegation.Proactively streamlined workflows toenhance productivity, identified potential risks early, and implemented effective mitigation strategies.Consistently delivered high-quality outputs within tight deadlines.

Delivered a wide range of freelance web development projects utilizing HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React,tailored to meet unique client needs and business objectives. Maintained close communication with clientsthroughout the development process to ensure alignment with expectations. Consistently met tightdeadlines and budget constraints while delivering responsive, user-friendly, and visually appealing websites,resulting in high levels of client satisfaction .

As a Civilian Hired Instructor (CHI) for the Indian Army at 6TTR, I led comprehensive training sessions on IoTand Python programming. I provided hands-on guidance, practical demonstrations, and real-world projectinsights to enhance the technical proficiency of participants. My efforts focused on building a strongfoundation in emerging technologies, fostering innovation, and empowering trainees with the skills neededfor modern defense and communication systems.
